resources.string: Depending on your end goals, there could also be changes in your professional life. Aries may ride the crest of a wave of innovation and undergo a personal metamorphosis due to their experiences. You may be on the cusp of impressive professional achievement in the years second half.

Emotional upheaval is possible on the family front early this year. The first quarter may bring surprises from loved ones as they voice their opinions and criticisms. Ask deep questions and probe deeply into any and all family responsibilities.
